metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32001 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** We issued this CVE pre-maturely, as we have subsequentlyrealized that this issue points out a problem that there really is no safemeasures around or protections for.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32001` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 8.2.1-1ubuntu2
libcurl3-gnutls - 8.2.1-1ubuntu2
libcurl3-nss - 8.2.1-1ubuntu2
libcurl4 - 8.2.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.2.1-1ubuntu2').
